quiz.question: What does the Longest Common Subsequence (LCS) problem ask?
options: Find the longest string present in both sequences
Find the longest sequence that appears in the same relative order in both strings
Find the longest contiguous substring in both strings
Find the sum of all common characters
quiz.answer: Find the longest sequence that appears in the same relative order in both strings

quiz.question: Time complexity of DP solution for LCS with strings of length m and n is:
Is LCS problem solvable recursively without DP?
Space optimization can reduce LCS DP table to:
LCS is an example of which algorithmic paradigm?

hackerrank_problems.title: The Longest Common Subsequence
hackerrank_problems.description: Find the length of the longest subsequence common to two given strings.

hackerrank_problems.title: Abbreviation
hackerrank_problems.description: Use LCS-like DP to determine if one string can be transformed into another using uppercase conversions.

hackerrank_problems.title: Longest Palindromic Subsequence
hackerrank_problems.description: Use DP and LCS logic to find the longest palindromic subsequence in a string.
